title.name: Christian Langer Fernandez
title.description: A Fusion of Creativity and Technical Mastery. From Graphic Design to System Development, a journey of continuous evolution and innovation.

contact.address: Av. Marcelo Terceros Banzer #181, Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia
contact.addressLine2: Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia

profile: As a dynamic and creative professional, I've journeyed through an enriching career that intersects design, technology, and leadership.

My path began as a graphic designer, quickly expanding into the fascinating world of 3D modeling and architectural visualization. Self-motivated learning in Unreal Engine and JavaScript broadened my technical horizons.

At Federal Cash Buyers, I honed my expertise in lead management and system development, adeptly navigating complex CRM integrations and data management with Node.js. My career is a tapestry of creativity and technical acumen, driven by a passion for crafting solutions that are not only visually appealing but also functionally robust and user-centric.

positions.role: Systems Development, Maintenance, Data Management, Tech Support
positions.description: Specialized in CRM backends like Salesforce and Podio, integrating them with systems like LaunchControl, CallTools, and CallRail. Utilized Node.js for backend development and system integrations.

Did lead Management initially then my boss had to leave the company and I ended up taking over the lead management alone. After a few months we hired a lead managers whom I trained and managed for a time. I then proceeded to take over systems development, maintenance and all other 'Tech' related things, from help with computer issues, to sourcing and managing large quantities of real-estate data.
Continued delivering work similar to previous roles, focusing on creating marketing materials including catalogs and flyers, showcasing a consistent and versatile design skill set.

Collaborated with former Zermat International sellers who transitioned to Lebel, providing continued support in their marketing endeavors. This role expanded to include landing page design and development, demonstrating versatility and adaptability in digital marketing.

Managed social media for various clients such as Leche Pil, SodaFrutss, Picolo, and others. Focused predominantly on Facebook management, while also handling Twitter accounts, ensuring cohesive and effective online presence.

Oversaw design coherence with brand guidelines for various clients, ensuring alignment with their brand identity. Actively engaged in design work for several brands, extending beyond social media content, demonstrating a keen eye for brand-centric design.

Embarked on my professional journey in Venezuela as a freelance graphic designer for Zermat International. Specialized in creating catalogs, flyers, and a range of marketing materials, laying the foundation for a versatile career in design and technology.
